entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
